params.tokens: Tokens to deposit. Approvals should be made prior to this call

params.amount: The amount of token to swap out of
params.swapData: Call to the swap router to perform to execute the swap

ETH().notice: Notional address we use to identify raw eth transfers

depositFunds(address[],uint256[]).notice: Deposit tokens and/or ETH for later swapping

destinationToken().notice: Token that deposits will be swapped into

transmute(address[],address,uint256,byte.notice: Swap the given token for the given users to the `destinationToken`

userBalances(address,address).notice: Mapping of user -> token -> deposited balance

@title Allows users to deposit tokens which can later be swapped into the `destinationToken` in bulk and redistributed
